sections.title: Thornbound Choir
sections.content: The Thornbound Choir are masters of ritual and sacrifice, their ranks filled with those who have bound themselves to ancient pacts. Their warriors are marked by living thorns that grow from their flesh, granting them unnatural resilience and the ability to channel the power of their dark patrons.

sections.title: Moonfall Covenant
sections.content: The Moonfall Covenant draws its power from the shattered remains of a fallen moon. Their warriors are marked by lunar scars that pulse with cold light, and they wield weapons forged from moon-metal that can cut through reality itself.

sections.title: Carrion Emissaries
sections.content: The Carrion Emissaries are death-worshippers who believe in the sanctity of decay. Their warriors are wrapped in preserved flesh and bone, and they carry relics that can drain the life from their enemies to fuel their own unnatural existence.

sections.title: Orrery of the Hollow Star
sections.content: The Orrery of the Hollow Star are cosmic scholars who study the patterns of the void. Their warriors wear armor inscribed with star-maps and wield weapons that can bend space and time to their will.

sections.title: Verdigrave Syndicate
sections.content: The Verdigrave Syndicate are masters of alchemy and corruption. Their warriors are marked by verdigris growths that spread across their bodies, granting them the ability to transform their flesh into living metal or toxic compounds.

sections.title: Hollow Saints
sections.content: The Hollow Saints are former holy warriors who have been hollowed out by their faith. Their warriors wear armor made from the remains of their fallen comrades, and they carry relics that can channel the power of their lost divinity.

sections.title: Bastion Concord
sections.content: The Bastion Concord are the last defenders of a fallen empire. Their warriors wear ancient power armor and wield weapons from a forgotten age, fighting to preserve the last remnants of their once-great civilization.
